Title: Chapter Four: Fugazi
Writer: Michael Connelly (based on the novels by), Eric Ellis Overmyer (developed for television by), George Pelecanos (teleplay by), Michael Connelly (teleplay by)
Actors: Titus Welliver, Jamie Hector, Amy Aquino, Lance Reddick
Plot: The bones investigation uncovers the family's dark past. As Bosch's court case reaches a climactic verdict, he gets caught up in a dangerous field trip with Waits, who may be setting him up...
